scripts.clear:cache: pnpm cache delete && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.check-all: pnpm depchk && pnpm test:type && pnpm lint && pnpm test
scripts._deploy:netlify: pnpm --package=netlify-cli dlx netlify deploy --dir apps/app-vite/dist --site b4857302-e544-4fd2-9c3b-0e3e3a30773f --auth nfp_9RGshwZ63ie9txj8tf2s65DGaX1L69mE2099 --filter app-vite
